com.risk.models

Class Players

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.risk.models.Players
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Strategy

    public class Players
extends java.lang.Object
implements Strategy
    This is a model class for playerContinent, playerArmy, playerList, playerPlaying as its data member.
